medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began having right lower quadrant (RLQ), non-migratory, non-colicky pain starting approximately 1 week ago. The pain has significantly increased in degree over the past few days, prompting her to go see her doctor, who recommended an emergency department visit. She endorses accompanying fever, vomiting, and nonbloody diarrhea, along with some intolerance to oral intake.
